DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: ARAUJO FILHO, P. F.;ARAUJO-FILHO, PAULO FREITAS DE;DE ARAUJO-FILHO, PAULO FREITAS;FREITAS DE ARAUJO-FILHO, PAULO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Paulo Freitas й professor do Centro de Informбtica (CIn) da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE). Formado em engenharia eletrфnica, Paulo й mestre e doutor em ciкncias da computaзгo pela UFPE. Tambйm й doutor em engenharia elйtrica pela Йcole de Technologie Supйrieure, Universitй du Quйbec, Canadб. Seus principais interesses de pesquisa incluem ciberseguranзa, sistemas de detecзгo de intrusгo, inteligкncia artificial, deep learning, ataques adversariais e objetos conectados.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Paulo Freitas de Araujo Filho is an assistant professor at Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE). Paulo received the bachelors degree (with Hons.) in electrical and electronic engineering and the M.S. and Ph.D. degrees in computer science from UFPE, Recife, Brazil, in 2016, 2018, and 2023, respectively. Paulo has also received the Ph.D, degree in electrical engineering from the E#769;cole de Technologie Supe#769;rieure, Universite#769; du Quebec, Montreal, QC, Canada, in 2023. His current research interests include security, intrusion detection systems, artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, and adversarial attacks.
